price: Ese día se le informará al ser humano todo cuanto hizo y dejó de hacer.
arabic: يُنَبَّؤُاْ ٱلۡإِنسَٰنُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: yunabba-u al-insānu yawma-idhin bimā qaddama wa-akhara
